content:
Hi All,

Just a quick note that we're on track to ship HAPI FHIR 5.0.0 on May 13. This is a huge release with some great new features and some breaking changes so we're moving to a new major release number.

Details on the Webinar can be found here: https://blog.smilecdr.com/2020/04/27/hapi-fhir-and-smile-cdr-may-2020-release-webinar/

As always we'll be recording and sharing a link for anyone who can't make it at the time.

Cheers,
James

The recording of the release webinar is available here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RYwCHdzzxS8

(Sorry, it has a few mins of dead air at the start of the video- We're still figuring out YouTube streaming apparently :)
It was actually ready 2 minutes after you stopped presenting - which is impressive
heh. That was an experiment with youtube streaming.. I'm super happy with it, we're probably gonna abandon Zoom entirely for the next one.

James Agnew said:

The recording of the release webinar is available here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RYwCHdzzxS8

(Sorry, it has a few mins of dead air at the start of the video- We're still figuring out YouTube streaming apparently :)

@James Agnew this video has been removed could you please reupload it ? Thanks

Sorry about that, not sure why it broke!

We're re-upoading, I'll post here as soon as it's back.

Apologies for the mixup with the video.

This is the new link for the Labrador release webinar: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GgdvRd64hYA
@James Agnew Thanks. Where can one find upgrade instructions? We are 4.1 JPA and would like to upgrade.
is this still the best resource for upgrading from 4.1 https://hapifhir.io/hapi-fhir/docs/server_jpa/upgrading.html ?
